Lint/UnexpectedBlockArity.description:
Description

Looks for blocks that have fewer arguments that the calling method expects.
Lint/UnexpectedBlockArity.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

Methods: {'chunk_while': 2, 'each_with_index': 2, 'each_with_object': 2, 'inject': 2, 'max': 2, 'min': 2, 'minmax': 2, 'reduce': 2, 'slice_when': 2, 'sort': 2} (type: dict)
